title: [Erikhaa's Combat Gear]
[Erikhaa's Weaponry]
[Erikhaa's Armory]
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the red brocade walls, and a maoral beam ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of a knotty pine floor.  There is a carved mahogany box on one side of the shop and a gold-veined black marble counter on the other.
